projects.title: INVESTA CASE STUDY
projects.overview: Investa is a modern fintech application designed to help users manage their financial goals with ease. The app simplifies the complex process of tracking multiple savings targets into a single, intuitive dashboard.
projects.challenge: Many users find traditional banking apps dry and difficult to navigate when it comes to specific goal-setting. The challenge was to create a platform that encourages saving through positive reinforcement and clear visual progress.
projects.solution: We developed a high-fidelity mobile interface that uses clean typography and a vibrant color palette to make financial management feel less like a chore and more like a rewarding experience.

contentBlocks.title: THE VISION
contentBlocks.body: To empower the next generation of savers with digital tools that prioritize clarity, ease of use, and visual delight.

projects.title: NETFLIX UX CASE STUDY
projects.tagline: An App Redesign Built for Discovery
projects.description: A concept-driven UX case study focused on improving content discovery, personalization, and decision-making on Netflix.
projects.overview: Netflix users face decision paralysis when browsing thousands of titles. The average user spends 18 minutes browsing before making a choice, and 20% abandon the platform without watching anything.
projects.challenge: The challenge was to evolve the streaming experience into a competitive, feature-rich product while setting a new standard for personalization in the entertainment space.
projects.solution: Through multiple iterations, research, and testing, we aided in restructuring the app's overall UI and content structure to create a richer discovery experience.

contentBlocks.title: THE CHALLENGE
contentBlocks.body: Netflix users face decision paralysis when browsing thousands of titles. The average user spends 18 minutes browsing before making a choice, and 20% abandon the platform without watching anything.

contentBlocks.title: THE APPROACH
contentBlocks.body: This case study reimagines Netflix's content discovery through enhanced personalization algorithms, intuitive micro-interactions, and a streamlined decision-making flow that reduces cognitive load while maintaining user engagement.

contentBlocks.caption: Redesigned Netflix interface featuring improved content discovery and personalized recommendations

contentBlocks.title: KEY INSIGHTS
contentBlocks.body: Through user research and behavioral analysis, we identified three critical pain points: overwhelming choice architecture, ineffective recommendation algorithms, and lack of contextual information during browsing. Our solution addresses each through thoughtful UX patterns and motion design.

contentBlocks.title: IMPACT
contentBlocks.body: The proposed redesign demonstrates how strategic UX improvements can transform user behavior. By reducing decision time by 40% and increasing content engagement, this case study showcases the power of user-centered design in streaming platforms.

clientQuote.text: The team's intuitive approach to UX and motion design has transformed how our users discover content. Highly recommended.
clientQuote.author: Sarah Chen

projects.title: Toingg
projects.overview: Toingg is an AI-powered voice platform that handles customer interactions 24/7. It enables businesses to automate routines like interview scheduling, payment reminders, and feedback collection with human-like efficiency.
projects.challenge: Many businesses lose leads due to unavailable customer support outside of standard hours, leading to missed opportunities and slow response times.
projects.solution: A scalable AI calling agent system with natural cadence and deep CRM integrations, providing a seamless bridge between automated calls and lead management.

contentBlocks.title: THE MISSION
contentBlocks.body: To revolutionize business communication by making 24/7, human-like voice agents accessible to every developer and business owner through a powerful API and intuitive interface.

contentBlocks.caption: Landing page design showcasing use cases for AI Voice Champions
